sentences.sContent: But if you're hoping to get a glimpse of Xia Da herself, you may have to wait in line for quite some time.
sentences.sContent_eng: But if you're hoping to get a glimpse of Xia Da herself, you may have to wait in line for quite some time.
sentences.sCn: 但是如果你想一睹夏达的风采的话，那就得排队等上一阵子了。 作家也应邀参加了这次书展。 。

sentences.sContent: Voting has always puzzled scholars: How is it rational to wait in line on a cold November afternoon when there is almost no chance that your ballot will make any difference?
sentences.sContent_eng: Voting has always puzzled scholars: How is it rational to wait in line on a cold November afternoon when there is almost no chance that your ballot will make any difference?
sentences.sCn: 投票行为总是令学者困惑：某人在一个寒冷的十一月下午排着长队去投一张不能影响选举结果的选票到底是为了什么？
